name: CaseId
description: Case ID

name: WEIGHT
description: Post-stratification weights - 18+ general population (N=1,095)

name: PS_A_Medicaid
description: [I favor expanding Medicaid insurance benefits for low income families to provide coverage for treatment of opioid use disorders.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_B_Naloxone
description: [I favor making naloxone...widely available and affordable without a prescription.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_C_Mandatory
description: [I believe that making treatment mandatory is an effective way to help people with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_D_GovSpend
description: [I favor increasing government spending to improve treatment of opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_Treatment
description: [I favor passing laws to protect people from criminal charges for drug related crimes if they attend substance use treatment.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_L_JailTreatment
description: [I believe that people in jail/prison with an opioid use disorder should be allowed access to medication for their opioid use disorder...] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_J_JailHealth
description: [I believe that incarceration/jail is an effective way to improve the health of people with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: PS_K_JailOverdose
description: [I believe that incarceration/jail is an effective way to reduce the risk of overdosing for people with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: Release_Incarcerated
description: [I believe jails and prisons should consider whether those convicted of non-violent crimes should be released to prevent the spread of COV-ID 19 within jails/prisons.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_A_HistoryWork
description: [I would be willing to have a person with a past history of opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_C_CurrentWork
description: [I would be willing to have a person with a current opioid use disorder start working closely with me on a job.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_D_CurrentMarry
description: [I would be comfortable having a person with a current opioid use disorder marry into my close or immediate family.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_B_HistoryMarry
description: [I am comfortable having a person with a past history of opioid use disorder marry into my close or immediate family.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_E_Dangerous
description: [People with a current opioid use disorder are more dangerous than the general population.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_F_Trust
description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder cannot be trusted.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_CurrentSteal
description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder would be willing to steal money or valuable items in order to get drugs.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_HistorySteal
description: [A person who has a past history of opioid use disorder would be willing to steal money or valuable items in order to get drugs.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_CurrentHighRisk
description: [A person who currently has an opioid use disorder is likely to experience personal problems that would make them a high-risk employee in my workplace.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: SS_HistoryHighRisk
description: [A person who has a past history of opioid use disorder is likely to experience personal problems that would make them a high-risk employee in my workplace.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_WhiteAdvantage
description: [White people in the U.S. have certain advantages because of the color of their skin.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_Successful
description: [Race is very important in determining who is successful and who is not.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_Prison
description: [Race plays an important role in who gets sent to prison.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_SocServices
description: [Race plays a major role in the type of social services (such as type of health care or day care) that people receive in the U.S.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_Opportunity
description: [Racial and ethnic minorities do not have the same opportunities as white people in the U.S.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_MinAdvantage
description: [Racial and ethnic minorities in the U.S. have certain advantages because of the color of their skin.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_Rich
description: [Everyone who works hard, no matter what race they are, has an equal chance to become rich.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_WhiteBlame
description: [White people are more to blame for racial discrimination than racial and ethnic minorities.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements?

name: RACE_Discrimination
description: [Mainly due to discrimination?] Do you think these differences are…

name: RACE_LearnAbility
description: [Because most Black people have less in-born ability to learn?] Do you think these differences are…

name: RACE_Education
description: [Because most Black people don't have the chance for education that it takes to rise out of poverty?] Do you think these differences are…

name: RACE_Motivation
description: [Because most Black people just don't have the motivation or will power to pull themselves up out of poverty?] Do you think these differences are…

name: Personal_COVIDtest
description: Have you been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)? If so, what was the result?

name: TestReason_Sick
description: [I felt sick] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: TestReason_Exposed
description: [I was afraid I got exposed from a recent activity (e.g, being on an airplane, large wedding, concert)] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: TestReason_Required
description: [It was required] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: TestReason_HighRisk
description: [I consider myself high-risk for COVID-19 and want to be safe] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: TestReason_Spread
description: [I wanted to make sure I was not spreading the coronavirus to other people] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: TestReason_Free
description: [My city/town was offering free testing] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: TestReason_Know
description: [I just wanted to know] You indicated you were tested for COVID-19, which of the following were reasons you got tested?

name: HH_TestPositive
description: [At least one has been tested and he/she tested positive] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_TestNegative
description: [At lease one has been tested and he/she NEVER tested positive] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_TestUnknown
description: [At least one has been tested and I do not know the result] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_COVIDSymptoms
description: [At least one has not been tested, but he/she experienced COVID-19 symptoms] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_NoCOVID
description: [At least one has not been tested and he/she has not experienced COVID-19 symptoms] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_NoMembers
description: [There is no one else living in my household] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_DK
description: [DON'T KNOW] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_SKP
description: [SKIPPED ON WEB] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_REF
description: [REFUSED] Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: HH_COVIDdeath
description: Has anyone in your household passed away/died because of COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

name: WashHands
description: [Washing/sanitizing hands more than usual] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

name: AvoidTransit
description: [Avoiding public transportation (e.g., bus, subway, train, commuter rail)] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

name: LessGroups10
description: [Limiting interactions with others to groups of 10 or less] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

name: SixFeet
description: [Keeping a 6-foot radius when interacting with people you do not live with] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

name: WearMask
description: [Wearing a mask or face covering when leaving home] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

name: OtherMeasure
description: [I have done other things to keep myself safe] In the past two weeks, which of the following have you done as a general response to the coronavirus pandemic?

name: Restaurant
description: [Gone out to a bar, club, restaurant or other place where people gather] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

name: Visitors
description: [Gone to a friend, neighbor, or relative’s residence (that is not your own) or had visitors such as friends, neighbors or relatives at your residence] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

name: Gathering
description: [Attended a gathering with more than 10 people, such as a reunion, wedding, funeral, birthday party, concert, or religious service] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

name: SharedItems
description: [Shared items like towels or utensils with other people not in your household] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

name: OthersNoMask
description: [Had close contact (within 6 feet) with people who do not live with you and they were without masks or face coverings] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

name: SelfNoMask
description: [Been within 6 feet of someone outside your household and you were not wearing a mask or face covering] In the past two weeks, have you done the following:

name: SocDisBelief
description: [I do not believe in social distancing] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: COVIDunlikely
description: [Those I gathered with were unlikely to have the coronavirus] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SicknessBelief
description: [I don’t think coronavirus will make me really sick] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: StayedOutside
description: [We stayed outside most of the time] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SocObligation
description: [I felt like I had to go to the event or be in that situation] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SocDisOther
description: [Other] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SocDisDK
description: [I don't know why] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SocDis_DK
description: [DON'T KNOW] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SocDis_SKP
description: [SKIPPED ON WEB] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: SocDis_REF
description: [REFUSED] Please select the reason(s) why you did not social distance.

name: VaxPlans
description: If a vaccine against the coronavirus becomes available, do you plan to get vaccinated, or not?

name: Vax_ProtectFam
description: [I want to protect my family] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Vax_ProtectComm
description: [I want to protect my community] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Vax_ProtectSelf
description: [I want to protect myself] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Vax_DocRec
description: [My doctor recommends vaccines] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Vax_NormalLife
description: [Life won’t go back to normal until most people are vaccinated] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Vax_MostPublic
description: [I think the majority of the public will get the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Vax_Other

description: [I am allergic to vaccines] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

description: [I don’t like needles] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

description: [I’m not concerned about getting seriously ill from the coronavirus] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

description: [I won’t have time to get vaccinated] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_GetInfected
description: [I would be concerned about getting infected with the coronavirus from the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_SideEffect
description: [I would be concerned about side effects from the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_DontWork
description: [I don’t think vaccines work very well] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_Politics
description: [Politicians might promote a vaccine to win votes even if it is not fully tested or safe] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_NotSerious
description: [The coronavirus outbreak is not as serious as some people say it is] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_MostPublic
description: [I don’t think the majority of the public will get the vaccine] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: NoVax_Other
description: [Other] Which of the following are reasons you would not get a coronavirus vaccine?

name: Change_Famous
description: [Famous people I trust get the coronavirus vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

name: Change_Friends

name: Change_MajPublic
description: [The majority of the public gets the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

name: Change_Free
description: [The vaccine is free] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

name: Change_DocRec
description: [My doctor recommends that I get the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?

name: Change_Nothing
description: [There is nothing that would make me get the vaccine] Which of the following reasons would make you reconsider getting the coronavirus vaccine?
